Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Find the remote control.', '2. Use the remote control to turn on the TV.']

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote)
        # Select the remote control

        bind room: item where:
            is_home_office(room) or is_bedroom(room) or is_dining_room(room)
        # Consider rooms where the remote control is likely to be found

        if exists r: item : inside(remote, r) and inside_char(char, r):
            achieve close_char(char, remote)
            # If the remote is in the same room as the character, move character closer to it
        
        else:
            foreach r: item:
                if is_home_office(r) or is_bedroom(r) or is_dining_room(r):
                    observe(r, "Check is the remote control inside the room")
                    # Observe each room to find the remote control

Goal Representation:
behavior use_remote_control_to_turn_on_tv(remote_control:item, tv:item):
    body:
        achieve facing_char(char, remote_control) 
        # Ensure the character faces the remote control to use it

        use_remote_control(remote_control, tv) 
        # Use the remote control to turn on the TV

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind home_office_319: item where:
            is_home_office(home_office_319)
        # Bind the home office

        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and inside(remote_control, home_office_319)
        # Bind the remote control found in home_office_319

        bind tv: item where:
            is_television(tv) and inside(tv, home_office_319)
        # Bind the TV located in home_office_319

        use_remote_control_to_turn_on_tv(remote_control, tv) 
        # Utilize the remote to turn on the TV

behavior use_remote_control(remote:item, tv:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote) # The remote control should be in hand to use it
        achieve facing_char(char, tv) # Make sure the character is facing the TV
        achieve is_on(tv) # Turn on the TV

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind home_office_319: item where:
            is_home_office(home_office_319)
        bind dining_room_201: item where:
            is_dining_room(dining_room_201)
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and inside(remote_control, home_office_319)
        # Select the remote control inside home office 319
        bind television: item where:
            is_television(television) and inside(television, dining_room_201)
        # Select the television inside dining room 201
        use_remote_control(remote_control, television)

behavior use_remote_to_turn_on_tv(remote:item, television:item):
    body:
        assert close(remote, television)
        # Ensure the remote is close to the television to enable effective use

        achieve is_on(television)
        # Turn on the television

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote)
        # Select the remote control

        bind television: item where:
            is_television(television)
        # Select the television

        achieve close_char(char, remote)
        # Ensure character is close to the remote

        achieve close(remote, television)
        # Ensure the remote is close to the television

        use_remote_to_turn_on_tv(remote, television)
        # Turn on the television using the remote

behavior use_remote_control_to_turn_on_tv(remote:item, television:item):
    body:
        achieve facing_char(char, television)
        achieve facing(remote, television)
        achieve is_on(television)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind home_office_319: item where:
            is_home_office(home_office_319)

        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote) and inside(remote, home_office_319)

        bind television: item where:
            is_television(television) and inside(television, home_office_319)
        
        use_remote_control_to_turn_on_tv(remote, television)
